com.scanlibrary

Class ScanActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scanlibrary.ScanActivity

  • public class ScanActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple class to get access to native methods of the scanLibrary's ScanActivity class.
    Author:
    Nalin Angrish
